__e: Man look quiet and correct in one of them.
Ever since you encouraged her last week to "speak in truth," she hasn't shut up, and it seems the truth is I can't do anything right, never have, never will.
You shut her up man, and I was not aware that my friend is the son of a rich man.
It bothers me that you clammed up!
I never know what you might be thinking when you're silent like this.
Like, you know, when I'm alone and it's very quiet, like now.
